sentences.english: Cumulate probability distribution of trials of random variable of uniform distribution.
sentences.chinese: 随机变数多次试验结果之累积机率为均匀分布。

sentences.english: Therefore, individual-preference curves should be substituted for statistical probabilities in decision trees.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在决策树中个人的偏好曲线应当取代统计机率。

sentences.english: Kevin knew winning the lottery was a long shot, but he bought a lottery ticket anyway.
sentences.chinese: 凯文知道中乐透的机率不大，但还是买了一张彩券。

sentences.english: The probability of losing elite genotypes in pedigree was larger than in mass selection.
sentences.chinese: 优良基因型的丢失机率，系谱法高于混合法。

sentences.english: More chances of disappearance occurred in theresponses to dorsal column stimulation than the responses in the dorsolateral side.
sentences.chinese: 其中，以背索刺激引起的逆向反应的消失机率居多。

sentences.english: The EVT is most useful in estimating tail probabilities of extreme events.
sentences.chinese: 极值理论最常用在估计极端事件的尾端机率分配。

sentences.english: Many people [have] terrible ideas about the odds.
sentences.chinese: 有许多人对机率这个东西很疯狂。

sentences.english: He says a lack of security will increase the chances of voting irregularities.
sentences.chinese: 他说，缺乏安全会加大投票违规行为的机率。

sentences.english: Discovery chance after supporting rebels is now no longer unreasonably high.
sentences.chinese: 支持乱党的发现机率，不会再没来由地高。

sentences.english: Cumulate probability distribution of trials of random variable of normal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 随机变数多次试验结果之累积机率为常态分布。

sentences.english: The probability is high that some of these organisms will be picked up and carried over when a transfer is made .
sentences.chinese: 在移植平板上长出的菌落携带杂菌的机率是相当高的。

sentences.english: But it's possible the beams could impact low orbiting satellites on rare occassions.
sentences.chinese: 不过，粒子束可能会以非常小的机率影响低轨卫星。

sentences.english: Rates of leukemia and non-Hodgkin lymphoma increased in both men and women.
sentences.chinese: 在男女双方里加重的白血病和非霍奇金淋巴瘤的机率。

sentences.english: A simple blood test may predict future heart disease. A number of risk factors can predict your chance of getting a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 根据一些风险因素，能够预测出你患心肌梗塞的机率。

sentences.english: The Japanese have a very low rate of caner and heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 日本人得癌症和心脏病的机率低了很多。

sentences.english: The highest percentage of victim injuries was from blunt trauma and burns.
sentences.chinese: 受难者受伤的最高机率就是硬物外伤和烧伤。

definition: a tiny bit/very little/next to nothing (idiom)
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
